subject: From the Director of National Agency for Petroleum and Pipeline Marketing (NAPPM) Nigeria
body:
Dear  *Sir*

Thanks for your prompt response.

Good morning, how are you doing? I hope you have a wonderful weekend with
your family. Now that we have an understanding, I would move action
immediately to adjust our records and have my sources in some strategic
departments and offices do the same in their records. This would have your
data reflected in our records as having carried out a certain work for us,
for which this 18 million payment is legally owed to you.

The status of the $18Million would be regularised to reflect in all files
and records that it is your approved, lawful payment for a certain contract
executed for the NAPPM a couple of years back.

I would have an attorney file in the documents with the CBN for processing
and transfer to your bank account. The bank would immediately process and
transfer the fund into your account within 3 days.

As pointed out in my first email, youâ€™ll keep 30 % as your own bonafide
share.
The remaining 70 % is mine though you would get another 10percent in any
investments I make under your tutelage.  Yes, I would need you as my front
to invest the fund.

Below are the items I require from you, to enable me start the procedure:

1. Photocopy of your VALID international passport.

2. Your Full name and address

3. Your cell phone number for unrestricted access to you.

4. Your bank account to receive the transfer>>>>>> Account name, your
account number, Bank name, Bank address, Swift Code, Bank telephone number.

5. Your Occupation

The business is projected to be completed within 10-working days, from the
date I receive the above listed items from you. Lastly, it is important you
treat this business as strictly confidential, while I look forward to a
healthy and lasting business relationship with you.

I am available for all further questions and explanations you may need.

Dr. Smith Mark
